body.name: Samsung Galaxy S4 SGH-I337 USA GSM Unlocked Cellphone, 16GB, Frost White
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
features: TouchWiz UI CAMERA: 13 MP, 4128 x 3096 pixels, autofocus, LED flash (Primary)
Dual Shot, Simultaneous HD video and image recording, geo-tagging, touch focus, face and smile detection, image stabilization, HDR.
1080p@30fps, dual-video OS: Android OS, v4.2.2 (Jelly Bean) CPU: Quad-core 1.6 GHz Cortex-A15 & quad-core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A7 GPU: PowerVR SGX 544MP3
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
body.description: Slow and Fast Motion Capture every moment with Slow Motion video recording – no video editing tools necessary. Slow down or speed up all the action using the Galaxy S 4 Slow Motion and Fast Motion camera modes. Simply choose your mode, select your speed and start recording. Hardware Excellence View all your content on a stunning 5-inch Full HD Super AMOLED display that's powered by a robust 1.9GHz quad-core processor — all in a light 0.29LB smartphone. Take it at Your Own Pace Easy Mode is a setting you can use to simplify your home screen with bigger icons and your favorite apps, so you can take your time to discover the amazing world of your new Galaxy S 4. A Smartphone That Makes TV Better With WatchON you can change the TV channel from your phone. Also, get a custom TV guide that shows what you like to watch.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 259 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this phone from BREED, they came through with a factory fresh SIM unlocked SGH-i337.It does come with the standard carrier bloatware with the stock rom which can be removed or deactivated if you're savvy enough.Aside of the baseband and AT&T specific apps and branding, this is exactly identical as the M919 in terms of hardware.An important note to keep in mind, this particular model has the LTE band 4(1700/2100 AWS spectrum) factory disabled unlike most other GSM S4s with LTE so without jumping through hoops and messing with special diagnostic modes/Qualcomm software, this model as stock is only partway compatible with T-Mobile's LTE system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: I waited quite a while to review this phone (you know how everything is great for a while then all of a sudden 2-3 months later something goes south) NOT THIS PHONE. Its perfect. I bought it factory refurbished and it's like new. A little cosmetic damage like the seller said but the system is AMAZING fast no added junk no spamware literally like new. I love my galaxy s4 and have already bought a second one for my boyfriend who also loves it. No problems with these phones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This Phone is not Unlocked!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two phones from this company at the same time and both don't work properly. I wanted a Galaxy S 2. No one was selling this phone. So, I upgraded to the Galaxy S 4. I specifically was looking for a T-Mobile device that was unlocked. This seller said this phone was unlocked for all carriers. When the phone arrived it was an AT&T phone. This was a bummer. I waited for the phone to arrive only to see it was an AT&T phone. The seller did not list this on Amazon as an AT&T phone. Usually if the phone is an AT&T phone or Verizon or T-Mobile or whomever the seller will list that so the buyer will know. This seller deliberately hid the brand type of this phone.I thought since the seller listed the phone as unlocked and said that it would work with any carrier it still might work. Nope. I promptly took it to a T-Mobile store, and they said it would not work with T-Mobile only AT&T. They went on to say the phone was not unlocked. Now this is the second phone that I have bought from Warehouse Wireless and they are both paper weights. I could not even get on the google playstore or google one drive on this Galaxy s4! Regardless of the carrier one should still be able to connect to the internet and get on google play or one drive. It kept saying I couldn't sign in. All you need is an internet connection to sign in which I had. It did allow me to go to other websites but not log into any accounts. I have only had this phone a week and it is trash unusable. The seller really should have been honest and let the buyer know that this was a AT&T phone. Who wants to send it back look all over again and have to buy another phone and hope they don't get burned by a different seller. I have already been burned twice by buying two different phones from this seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Awesome phone. Have always had Apple iPhones and loved them but I like this phone way more than the iPhone. Battery life is great compared to the iPhones'. The quality of the build is not as good but the large clear beautiful screen makes up for it. Also purchased a Samsung Gear 2 Neo to go with it and it is totally awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must read do ur own homework to!
reviews.reviewText: Great phone....to bad its not compatible with any carriers but t-mobile till later this year... My fav phone of all time is now to old. RIP! 2013-2021ALL THE CARRIERS ARE SUTTING DOWN 3G WICH FU#$$ THIS PHONE....YES ITS 4G I HAD THE ARGUMENT WITH CRICKET ALREADY...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars the phone is great, but the battery stinks
reviews.reviewText: the phone is great, but the battery stinks!!! left it on charge 1.5 days and it finally said it was charged, used it for 5 minutes while it was still plugged in and it said again the battery was low. it said to put on charge and it already was on charge. NO GOOD BATTERY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I originally but the S4 in 2013 and love it. So happy to have found a replacement ...
reviews.reviewText: I just received this yesterday, I originally but the S4 in 2013 and love it. So happy to have found a replacement for mine that originally died. It's a great smartphone, easy to use and does everything I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 2 of these phones. One works perfectly, the other not so much. It tells me constantly that it cannot detect the sim card and has to restart. 5 minutes later, at the most, it does the same thing. It repeats this over and over until I remove the sim card and put it back in. It loses signal constantly while my husband, who has the other phone I ordered and the same service, works just fine. Then last night I plug it into the charger and it tells me disconnected battery. It did this over and over until I took the battery out and put it back in. I've contacted them today about returning it. I want to exchange the phone but all they offer is for you to get a refund. So I'm going to have to mail it back to them, wait at least 3 days for them to process the refund, then turn around and order a new phone and wait for it to be shipped. I hope I'm also refunded for the expedite shipping I paid!
Bought this phone as a gift for my boyfriend, he loved it. I bought it mainly because it is compatible with VR headsets.
On time and product as expected.
